                    Warner Brothers(2007). Length : 99min

 The death of a child in mysterious circumstances; sparks of a series of      
 events that seem to represent biblical plagues, start occurring in of all    
 places a town called *Haven* located deep in the bowels of bible belt        
 country in the bayous of Louisiana. A former Christian missionary turned     
 religious phenomena debunker and her top open minded student turned          
 personnel assistant is sent to investigate.
